title: minho72
author: minho72
created_time: January 31, 2023, 09:38:39 PMLast edit: February 01, 2023, 01:43:55 PM by minho72
content: We Moved Our Thread To Altcoin BoardOur New Thread

comments.author: Agbe
comments.created_time: January 31, 2023, 10:00:20 PMLast edit: January 31, 2023, 10:15:54 PM by Agbe
comments.body: The ANN thread is very good. Even the website is nice but I don't like casino linking it site to Binance Token (BNB). Now the user or the customer had to use TRUST WALLET for any transactions which will cost extra charges of moving the token out from trust wallet to BNB then from BNB to open source wallet. Only the process is very much conbersome. Well you are welcome to the forum. Your website looks simple, and everything is loading for now. There are some things you will do to keep your company has a good name. And that is prompt payment in any dealings. I like the ANN explanation of the site. And I will like to reset the block.

comments.author: bitcampaign
comments.body: firstly welcome to the forum, the site is not mobile friendly a bit slow to access it looks "Loading" takes so long, i also see the part not working yet like on the $Endergy page but glad to see you made promotion in this thread with full copper member account status an attractive display of image designs and an explanation of how to work

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: Quote from: bitcampaign on January 31, 2023, 10:32:36 PMfirstly welcome to the forum, the site is not mobile friendly a bit slow to access it looks "Loading" takes so long, i also see the part not working yet like on the $Endergy page but glad to see you made a promotion in this thread with full copper member account status an attractive display of image designs and an explanation of how to workThe site load pretty fast from my end, maybe the slow loading is from your connection, the mobile site is quite friendly and the graphics are cool to in conclusion the casino is starting on a good note and at that, I will like to join others to welcome. *Endblock to bitcointalk forum and I am excited to see that they already have a copper member account for easy posting of content and other materials as allowed in the forum. *Hope to see their presence more active on this thread to answer various questions that will be raised on this thread.

comments.author: notblox1
comments.body: Sorry but first thing I saw opening Endblock website is that weird looking video of woman speaking with robotic voice and picture doesn't really match the picture.Bitcoin is not supported on this website but only something connected with Binance network and I don't want to use and experiment with that.

comments.author: decodx
comments.body: Hey @minho72, welcome to the bitcointalk forum. Just wanted to give you a heads up that this section is specifically for Bitcoin gambling platforms. If your platform only works with altcoins, promoting it here might not be the best idea.Quote from: notblox1 on January 31, 2023, 11:21:57 PMSorry but first thing I saw opening Endblock website is that weird looking video of woman speaking with robotic voice and picture doesn't really match the picture.Yeah, that video was created using synthesia or a similar AI text-to-speech software. I'm not sure why some companies go for that for their marketing. That looks so fake. I mean, virtual AI actors can be neat, but it's all about making sure the message is delivered in the best way possible. It just depends on the situation. Like, you gotta choose what works best and what's gonna keep the audience engaged and informed. That's the most important thing, right?

comments.author: Little Mouse
comments.body: Do you have bitcoin on the platform? It seems you don't have. In that case, your ANN will be moved to altcoin marketplace.Seems like $END has a lot of utility on the platform. That's great!Feel free to contact me if you are looking for a nice boost of your project. I would gladly help through bitcointalk.

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: Quote from: Little Mouse on February 01, 2023, 12:47:01 AMDo you have bitcoin on the platform? It seems you don't have. In that case, your ANN will be moved to altcoin marketplace.Seems like $END has a lot of utility on the platform. That's great!Feel free to contact me if you are looking for a nice boost to your project. I would gladly help through bitcointalk.Nice one little mouse and wishing you all the best in your future project marketing management, I thought as much when I did not see bitcoin being listed as their accepted currency,  I wonder why casino does that anyways. *with the level of Bitcoin exposure and popularity it still baffles me how a cryptocurrency casino will not accept Bitcoin but altcoins, I don't know what their reasons are but whatever it is accepting bitcoin is far better in confidence building in players compared to other coins no Matter their utility or low fees

In that case, your ANN will be moved to altcoin marketplace.Seems like $END has a lot of utility on the platform. That's great!Feel free to contact me if you are looking for a nice boost to your project. I would gladly help through bitcointalk.Nice one little mouse and wishing you all the best in your future project marketing management, I thought as much when I did not see bitcoin being listed as their accepted currency,  I wonder why casino does that anyways. *with the level of Bitcoin exposure and popularity it still baffles me how a cryptocurrency casino will not accept Bitcoin but altcoins, I don't know what their reasons are but whatever it is accepting bitcoin is far better in confidence building in players compared to other coins no Matter their utility or low feesIndeed bitcoin is the most popular crypto token by every gambler and almost all gamblers will always ask whether your platform accepts bitcoins on a new gambling platform.Even though Bitcoin is the most prioritized, casinos must also be able to accept other tokens such as stable coins and top Altcoins such as ETH and BNB so that every gambler has many choices of tokens that they will use for transactions and making games or bets.So it's not only Bitcoin that is important, but there are several other tokens that are just as important and must be on every gambling platform.

comments.author: minho72
comments.body: Thank you so much to all for your suggestions. We have moved our thread . https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5437641.new#new

comments.author: Daltonik
comments.body: Quote from: minho72 on February 01, 2023, 01:46:57 PMThank you so much to all for your suggestions. We have moved our thread . https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5437641.new#newWell, this was expected because the gambling board is designed for publications about services that support bitcoin, of course this will reduce the number of requests, but who is interested will remain in the discussion.
